channel.title: European on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in European on ZooBerry

item.title: Camargue Wild Horse
item.description: A European wetlands horse living in semi-wild conditions in the swampy areas of southern France.

item.title: European Beaver
item.description: European Beaver (Eurasian Beaver), the first animal created by Panda11.

item.title: Fallow Deer
item.description: Here is the Fallow Deer. It is coded by Penguinman and beautifully recolored by Exitree. I hope you enjoy this European animal!

item.title: Eurasian Wolf
item.description: The Eurasian Wolf features two variants, with the lighter one as the default.

item.title: Iberian Wolf
item.description: The Iberian wolf (Canis lupus signatus) is a critically endangered wolf native to Portugal and Spain.

item.title: Norwegian Fjord Pony
item.description: A domesticated pony, one of the oldest horse breeds known to mankind.

item.title: Exmoor Pony
item.description: The Exmoor Pony is a hardy, sturdy breed of semi-feral pony, one of many of the mountain and moorland ponies of the British Isles.

item.title: Eurasian Badger
item.description: Eurasian badgers are easily recognisable by the conspicuous black and white stripes running from the nose to the shoulders.

item.title: Chamois
item.description: They live in rocky areas and alpine meadows in Europe (especially the Alps, Carpathians) and in Asia minor.

item.title: Wisent
item.description: This ungulate is also known as the European bison. Some authors consider it and the American bison to be conspecific.

item.title: European Badger
item.description: European Badger skinned and coded by ShenTirag, with the model created by SilesianTomcat.

item.title: Italian Wolf
item.description: A subspecies of wolf from the Apennine Mountains in Italy.
